alert.note: Alert for Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 06 at 2:33PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Cochise County through 315 PM MST... At 232 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near St. David, or 11 miles southeast of Benson. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Benson and St. David. This includes Route 80 between mile markers 296 and 310. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson
